Specimen preparation shall only be carried out by a medical practitioner, a pharmacist, or a registered nurse who has specialty training in oncology and in the administration of chemotherapy drugs.
Every health facility in which chemotherapy is administered shall have written policies and procedures for the management of adverse effects of such treatment on patients.
Every health facility in which chemotherapy is administered shall obtain a written consent from the patient or a legal representative of the patient before administering chemotherapy drugs.

Where a patient is receiving chemotherapy drugs at home, the health facility shall provide instructions to the patient or, where applicable in the circumstances, to any other person who may be assisting the patient or administering the drugs to the patient.
